metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4580 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
The x25_negotiate_facilities function in net/x25/x25_facilities.c in theLinux kernel before 4.5.5 does not properly initialize a certain datastructure, which allows attackers to obtain sensitive information fromkernel stack memory via an X.25 Call Request.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4580` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-28.47
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-28.47
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-lowlatency - 4.4.0-28.47
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1016-raspi2 - 4.4.0-1016.22
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1019-snapdragon - 4.4.0-1019.22
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1129-aws - 4.4.0-1001.10
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-143-generic - 4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-143-generic - 4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-143-lowlatency - 4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1003-gke - 4.4.0-1003.3
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-1003-gke - 4.4.0-1003.3
No subscription required
